title: zlib.dll is missing
body: em i need help, trying to download zlib.dll but when i have it says that it cant find zpipe_inf in the file and it drives me mad pls help me asap

replies.body:
Your PC might have strict settings preventing some files from being accessed or read.  Run through our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure these files are added as an exception.

You may need to grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) after and perform a force repatch just to make sure your files are installed properly.
none of that worked :( i tried evrything

No worries, grab the logs provided by the HRT and send us a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can work with you directly to get this figured out.  See you there!
